metadata.name: Example Cancer classifier Serve (Sklearn Serve)
metadata.description: Cancer Classifier Sklearn Serve With MLFlow. The model is deployed as a service to assist with automated annotation and classification of official documents. It exposes an API using the "serve" task.

metadata.name: Example Cancer Classifier Training With MLFLow (Python Job)
metadata.description: Train a cancer classifier ML model using MLFlow framework to structure and represent the model data. The trained model then can be deployed with the MLFlowServe framework or used for batch classifications loading it using the MLFlow framework.

metadata.name: Document Classifier Serve With Bert Model (Python Serve)
metadata.description: Document Classifier Serve With Bert Model. The model is deployed as a service to assist with automated annotation and classification of official documents. It exposes an API using the "serve" task.

metadata.name: Document Classifier Training With Bert Model (Python Job)
metadata.description: Document classifier relying on LLM implementations for different languages. This example uses Italian language BERT model (dbmdz/bert-base-italian-xxl-cased) for document classification. Built using HuggingFace transformers library.

metadata.name: Download Sentinel Data (Container Job)
metadata.description: Function for Sentinel image download and preprocessing

metadata.name: Example Echo Service (Python Serve)
metadata.description: A simple python-based API responding to a POST message with the "text" field. The function exposes an API using "serve" task.

metadata.name: Flood Mapping Analysis (Container Job)
metadata.description: Function to elaborate  Sentinel-2 imagery data for flood mapping analysis

metadata.name: Deforestation Analysis (Container Job)
metadata.description: Function to elaborate Sentinel-2 imagery data for deforestation analysis

metadata.name: Landslide Monitoring (Container Job)
metadata.description: Function to elaborate Sentinel-1 imagery data for landslide monitoring

metadata.name: Example Container Job (Python Job)
metadata.description: A simple example function demonstrating how to create a Python job that can be run in a containerized environment using predefined base images. This function serves as a template for building custom container jobs within the platform.

metadata.name: Example Container Serve (Python Serve)
metadata.description: A simple example function demonstrating how to create a Python job that can be run in a containerized environment using predefined base images. This function serves as a template for serving containerized functions within the platform.

metadata.name: Example DBT Transform (DBT Job)
metadata.description: This function demonstrates how to create a DBT transformation job. It performs a simple SQL query on a sample dataitem named 'employees'. It further processes the data to extract all records and filters them based on a specific department ID. The resulting dataset is logged for verification. This example serves as a foundational template for building more complex DBT transformations within your data workflows.

metadata.name: Example ETL (Python Job)
metadata.description: A simple extract transform load (ETL) procedure in Python that downloads a csv file and then returns the result as a dataframe that is stored in the project repository as table(data-item).

metadata.name: Example Hello World (Python Job)
metadata.description: Hello world with python: write a string to stdout

metadata.name: Example Validate Table (Python Job)
metadata.description: A simple example function that downloads a CSV file from a given URL, validate its content, and loads the report into a specified output table.

metadata.name: Flower Serve (flower-server)
metadata.description: This function demonstrates how to deploy and interact with the Flower framework inside the DigitalHub platform.

metadata.name: LLM Ollama Serve (Kubeai-Text Serve)
metadata.description: LLM Ollama Serve. This function demonstrates how to deploy and interact with the Llama 3.2 model using Ollama inside the DigitalHub platform.
